bibl.title: Pastoralism in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: On sheep and, only occasionally, on goats. - Article delivered as paper in Boston, December 29, 1989, in a "Seminar on Comparative Approaches to the Social History of Roman Egypt", during the Annual meeting of the American Philological Association.
bibl.seg: Keenan James G., Pastoralism in Roman Egypt.

On sheep and, only occasionally, on goats. - Article delivered as paper in Boston, December 29, 1989, in a "Seminar on Comparative Approaches to the Social History of Roman Egypt", during the Annual meeting of the American Philological Association.
